>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/agents/{id}/sources"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get all sources for an agent

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","required":true,"in":"path","description":"The UUID of the agent","schema":{"format":"uuid","type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Returns all sources for the agent","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","description":"The unique identifier of the source assignment","example":"123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000","format":"uuid"},"sourceId":{"type":"string","description":"The unique identifier of the source","example":"123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000","format":"uuid"},"name":{"type":"string","description":"The name of the source","example":"Project Documentation"},"type":{"type":"string","description":"The type of source","example":"file","enum":["file","url"]}},"required":["id","sourceId","name","type"],"title":"AgentSourceResponseDto"}}}}},"404":{"description":"Agent not found"},"500":{"description":"Internal server error"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
